text: Citizen Kane is perhaps the one American talking picture that seems as fresh now as the day it opened. It may seem even fresher.
author: Pauline Kael

text: Movies are something people see all over the world because there is a certain need for it.
author: Wim Wenders

text: Movies are an art form that is very available to the masses.
author: Richard King

text: Movies are a complicated collision of literature, theatre, music and all the visual arts.
author: Yahoo Serious

text: Every single art form is involved in film, in a way.
author: Sydney Pollack
